newsitem.title: USA: Royal Casino clarifies Mississippi ruling.
newsitem.headline: Royal Casino clarifies Mississippi ruling.

text.p: Royal Casino Group Inc said Thursday it has no affiliation with a similarly named company that received a negative ruling from the Mississippi Supreme Court on a casino project last week.
Royal Casino Group said the court ruled March 20 that a proposed casino site in Gulfport, Mississippi, by another company doing business as Royal Casino was illegal.
The company said it was responding to confusion in the marketplace that affected its stock price in recent days.
Officials at the other Royal Casino were not available for comment.
Royal Casino Group operates riverboat casinos and other gaming operations.
Its shares closed up $0.0775 Thursday at $0.6875.
